item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Stephanie Hobson and I like to make websites everyone can use. That means thinking about the people who use the web with different tools and different lives than what I have. People with: slower internet connections, older devices, screen readers, switch controls, or high contrast themes. People with: different gender, sexual orientation, skin colour, first language, or brain wiring. I like to think I’m making the world a better place one byte at a time.
